name: HSC GOLD BOOT BADGE for the Champion 2022

metadata.name: HSC GOLD BOOT BADGE for the Champion 2022
metadata.description: This HYPER GOLD BOOT BADGE is awarded to the eligible holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 in celebration of Argentina's Championship of the QATAR 2022 FIFA World Cup.
metadata.criteria: The badge is automatically awarded to the holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) with country property of Argentina at the time of 2022 FIFA World Cup final match.
metadata.evidence: The winner has been proved to be the holder of the Team Argentina NFT(s) of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 at the time of 2022 FIFA World Cup Final Match.
metadata.properties: {"Game Year":{"name":"Game Year","value":"2022 QATAR"},"Game Result":{"name":"Game Result","value":"Final Champion"}}
